body_html: I just added #define SPEED_UNKNOWN -1 to the file torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc. It appears that this is suppose to be defined by one of the headers from the linux kernel, but I am guessing isn't defined for older versions.
body_text: I just added #define SPEED_UNKNOWN -1 to the file torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc.  It appears that this is suppose to be defined by one of the headers from the linux kernel, but I am guessing isn't defined for older versions.
body: I just added `#define SPEED_UNKNOWN -1` to the file `torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.cc`.  It appears that this is suppose to be defined by one of the headers from the linux kernel, but I am guessing isn't defined for older versions.
